definition: music played during a movie, play etc/incidental music/music played in a theatrical interlude/(fig.) incident/episode
to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose

sentences.english: People will pay for access to those in a way they won't for the latest episode of House or a reality show.
sentences.chinese: 人们付费来阅览的并非是一段议会的插曲或现实秀。

sentences.english: Since that film scores a great success, its interlude songs are also much sought after.
sentences.chinese: 由于那部电影大获成功，它的插曲也很受欢迎。

sentences.english: The incidents are of a more external kind, but very funny.
sentences.chinese: 这些插曲属于非常表面化的那种，但是十分有趣。

sentences.english: Many of the songs became popular.
sentences.chinese: 许多剧中的插曲变成流行歌。

sentences.english: I ask what the episode taught him.
sentences.chinese: 我问这段插曲给了他什么教训。

sentences.english: The Lehmans episode demonstrates that incompetence has a price.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼这个小插曲说明了无能有价。

sentences.english: The defeat to Chievo was painful for how it came, let's hope it was a singular episode.
sentences.chinese: 输给切沃是痛苦的，希望这只是一个小插曲。

sentences.english: The episode should serve as a warning to Europeans.
sentences.chinese: 这个小插曲对欧洲人应是个警讯。

sentences.english: Social media backers take that ignominious episode in stride.
sentences.chinese: 社会媒体的支持者对这种盲从的小插曲并不反对。

sentences.english: There's an interesting sidelight to this story.
sentences.chinese: 在这件事上面还有一个有趣的插曲。

sentences.english: It feels like I'm in an episode of Eastenders.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉自己就像是《东区人》里的一个插曲。

sentences.english: After this nice intermezzo we drive in one go all the way to Shigatze.
sentences.chinese: 在这美妙的小插曲之后，我们径直开往日喀则。

sentences.english: Can David Caruso and the rest of the crew crank out another good episode?
sentences.chinese: 可大卫卡鲁索和其他工作人员炮制出另一个好插曲？

sentences.english: This award winning innovative 26 half-hour episode series was produced by Film Australia.
sentences.chinese: 此获奖创新26半小时的插曲系列制作电影澳大利亚。

sentences.english: The witch-hunters ensured that the rest of his life was tainted by this episode.
sentences.chinese: 搜寻组确认说他的生活被这一段插曲玷污了。

sentences.english: This incident is remarkable for a couple of reasons.
sentences.chinese: 这幕小插曲之所以广为流传是出于以下几个原因。

definition: fragment (of speech etc)/extract (from book etc)/episode (of story etc)
sung performance/to sing for an audience
opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
